Name: Irrigation
Description: Supplies controlled amounts of water to land or crops in needed intervals.

Name: Hydroelectricity
Description: Generates electricity by passing water through a hydraulic turbine.

Name: Flood control
Description: Reduces the effects of flood waters or high-water levels on downstream areas.

Name: Recreation
Description: Reservoir allows for recreational activities (e.g., swimming, boating, fishing, etc.).

Name: Navigation
Description: Increases water levels on rivers to permit ship to navigate waters that were previously unnavigable.

Name: Fisheries
Description: Increasing water levels of the reservoir during spawning season creates suitable spawning habitat for fish, enhancing fish production and fishing success of anglers.

Name: Pollution control
Description: Protects the water resource by trapping polluted water in reservoirs or ponds.

Name: Invasive species control
Description: Prevents the spread of invasive species upstream or to environmentally sensitive areas within the waterway.

Name: Other
Description: The intended use of the dam cannot be defined by the use categories defined in this table.

Name: Unknown
Description: The intended use of the dam is unknown.
